attributes.action: Scrap the TV licence.  Because of the bias reporting from the BBC .
attributes.additional_details: Evidence can be freely found on the EU website of who gets what
attributes.background: The BBC, Sky, Channel 4 all receive funding from the EU to march out the EU's own lies and scare stories. they are acting way beyond their remit as neutral news channels. there-fore they should be stripped of the funding for the TV license and it should be scraped immediately.
